channel.title: Help with me source plz
channel.description: hello i downloaded a client called oceanscpae.client because on my source the client don't work (soulsplit) and oceanscape is supossed to work with all 317 but don't work on mine. i downloaded the client i did run and it said error connecting someone can help plz?

item.description:
@4NT wrote:

let me know if it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Help with me source plz
item.dc:creator: @4NT 4NT
item.description:
@4NT wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

^^ Moparscape Client

Click on where is says “here” on the first line, directly below the advertisement
Download then install

You should get a file called Moparscape (its a .jar file)
You might get a .rar file (winrar) if you do right click and go to “open with…” and chose “Java SE Binary”
Then the client should load up.
Download Hamachi, create new network (choose network name and password) make sure power is on.
Once loaded click on “File” which will be located at the top left of the client, click on “Change Server”
Copy the IP that appears on the Hamachi console
Change port in the same drop down menu on the client to 43594
Click on start server on client and the log in

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Help with me source plz
item.dc:creator: @4NT 4NT
item.description:
@4NT wrote:

i recommend downloading the moparscape 3.2 w/ aryan, make sure your hamachi network is on and your port matches.

Run server
Run Mopar client
Click “File”
Click “Change Server”
Add IP from hamachi network
Change port to 43594
Start Server
Login

Hope that helps.

4NT

Read full topic
